content.p: Building opened in October 2024 Opening Summer 2025 Campus welcome point, catering and multi-use meeting and event space The Weston Atrium provides participatory research facility for Connect Nottingham Browne Jacobson offices Law firm located at Castle Meadow since 2011 The buildings (excluding Mowbray House) are subject to a renaming process. We will announce updates in due course. Open since October 2023 This building is home to: City as Lab, INFINITY, The King's Trust, Human Flourishing Project and the CMC Progamme Management Office. This also has meeting rooms and exhibition space.
